message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn, I think a 55-45 split is more reasonable. The clock is ticking!
I can do 58-42, it's the best I can offer for now.
Time is running out, Alice. I'll come down a bit to 52-48. Don't let this opportunity slip away!
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, 56-44. Don't wait for inflation to eat away my share!
Alice, let's be realistic. 54-46 is my final offer.  We're running out of time, and inflation is only hurting you!
